name: Pill Cosbi
description:
Play as the main character called "Cosbi". Sir Cosbi has to gather all the pills and fight the gorgeous monsters to find his way out!This game currently features:
  • Variety of Levels
  • Variety of A.I. to "fight" with
  • Variety of pills

Controls:

  • A-S-D to control Sir Cosbi
  • W to jump
  • Left-Shift to shoot

Main objective of the game is to kill all enemies and pass all levels.

We will make sure to add more levels by request!
